statements: SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE item_name = 'Shirt';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE price > 50;
SELECT item_name, price FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity <= 10 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM Inventory;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC, price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 50.00 ORDER BY price;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, price FROM Inventory WHERE item_name LIKE '%shirt%' OR quantity < 5 ORDER BY item_id;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 20 AND price < 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, location FROM inventory_items WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, last_updated FROM inventory_items ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, location FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity < 5 OR location IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items LIMIT 10;
SELECT item_name, quantity, location FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, location, last_updated FROM inventory_items WHERE last_updated >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date = '2021-10-15' AND quantity_changed > 0 ORDER BY transaction_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, quantity, location FROM inventory_items WHERE location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY quantity DESC, item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory_items ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sale_date, quantity_sold, total_price FROM sales WHERE quantity_sold > 10;
SELECT item_name, transaction_type, stock_change FROM stock_history WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY item_id ASC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory_items WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sale_id, item_id, sale_date FROM sales WHERE quantity_sold > 10 AND total_price > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory_items JOIN sales ON inventory_items.item_id = sales.item_id ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT item_id, COUNT(stock_id) AS total_transactions FROM stock_history GROUP BY item_id HAVING total_transactions > 5 ORDER BY item_id;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT category_name FROM categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM categories JOIN products ON categories.category_id = products.product_id GROUP BY category_name;

SELECT suppliers.supplier_name, orders.order_date, products.product_name FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.product_id JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items;
SELECT price, item_name FROM inventory_items ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Corp%';
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items ORDER BY item_name DESC, quantity ASC, price DESC;
SELECT item_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory_items GROUP BY item_name HAVING total_quantity > 50;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE contact_email IS NOT NULL AND address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, Contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%a%' OR supplier_name LIKE '%o%' ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC, total_amount DESC;
